name: Turn and Burn: The F-14 Dogfight Simulator
name_original: Turn and Burn: The F-14 Dogfight Simulator
description: Turn and Burn: The F-14 Dogfight Simulator is a modern jet flight simulation developed by Imagineering Inc. and released in 1992 for the Game Boy in Europe and North America. In Europe, the game was released as the Game Boy adaptation of Phantom Air Mission, the European version of Imagineering's previous flight simulator Flight of the Intruder. A sequel, Turn and Burn: No-Fly Zone, was later released for the Super NES.
